title: Dietary Needs: Requests (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Requests subcategory within Dietary Needs. Includes 7 card(s).

cards.english: Please serve it to me without eggs.

cards.japanese: トマト抜きでお願いします。

cards.english: A small serving of noodles please.
cards.japanese: 麺少な目でお願いします。

cards.english: A large serving of rice, please.
cards.japanese: ライス大盛りお願いします。
